title: game crashed then computer restarted
body: was in the middle of a game with gf and friend and then all three of us simultaneously had our games freeze, close and then had our computers restart without us doing anything, my friend got back into LOL within a couple minutes but the game had somehow finished in that small an amount of time which doesn't sound right to me and it says our game was a defeat yet match history said that we didn't lose any towers and I also don't think the remaining 2 players would have surrended that quickly after something that must have appeared as so obviously not just a rage quit. Did anyone else have this problem? why was it not a loss prevented?

replies.body:
Are you all on Windows? They recently had an update in preparation for the upcoming Windows 10, which requires a system reboot. If you were all in game when this happened then you wouldn't have seen the message saying "This computer will shutdown in three minutes."

And it's not that unfeasible for at least one of the two people to /ff when they see three others dc (usually because they never come back). And loss prevented is only for server wide issues (although recently, they will allow for some specific ISP issues that affect a large portion of players).
